member.name: IROTData.GetComparisonData
member.summary: Retrieves data from a moniker that can be used to test the moniker for equality against another moniker.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that receives the comparison data.
The length of the buffer specified in pbData.
A pointer to a variable that receives the length of the comparison data.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_OUTOFMEMORY and S_OK.

member.name: IROTData
member.summary: Implemented by monikers to enable the running object table (ROT) to compare monikers against each other.
